title: Moonlit Nights - Superb Scenes of Japan

episodes.description: Japan's "moon festivals" show the love Japanese people have for the moon. Witness exuberant, all-night traditional dancing and a unique tug-of-war, all carried out under the watchful eye of the moon.
episodes.subtitle: Moon Festivals
episodes.title: Moonlit Nights - Superb Scenes of Japan -

episodes.description: What do cuisine, art, and romance have in common in Japan? They are all used to show love for the moon. See for yourself how Japanese people play with the moon in this intriguing program.
episodes.subtitle: Playing with the Moon
episodes.title: Moonlit Nights - Superb Scenes of Japan -
